properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 1:17PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
A series of snow showers are lined up and are positioned to
affect a stretch of Highway 789 between Boysen Dam at the south
end of the Wind River Canyon, and Shoshoni through 3 PM this
afternoon as these snow showers track east over the area. Around
an inch of snow could accumulate from any of these snow showers.
Any one local area in this region has the potential to receive 2
to 3 inches of snow if each of these snow showers happen to cross
over the same area repeatedly.

If traveling along this particular stretch of Highway 789,
anticipate rapidly changing weather conditions, including slick
and snow covered roadways.

NWSheadline: Snow showers poised for Highway 789 between the Wind River Canyon and Shoshoni through 3 PM This Afternoon
